title: Ticket #5909: condor_router_q fails to parse list form of JOB_ROUTER_SCHEDD2_POOL
description:
If you set JOB_ROUTER_SCHEDD2_POOL to a list of collectors, condor_router_q fails to find any collectors and the following error occurs: 

_condor_TOOL_DEBUG=D_NETWORK,D_FULLDEBUG,D_HOSTNAME condor_ce_router_q -debug
   JOBS ST Route                GridResource
Error: COLLECTOR address or hostname not specified in config file
Extra Info: You specified a hostname for a pool (the -pool argument). That
should be the Internet host name for the central manager of the pool, but it
does not seem to be a valid hostname. (The DNS lookup failed.)

---------------- TOOL_DEBUG_ON_ERROR output -----------------
09/14/16 22:56:01 Invalid address: tweetybird01.cern.ch:9618,
---------------- TOOL_DEBUG_ON_ERROR ends -

I've been able to reproduce this by setting JOB_ROUTER_SCHEDD2_POOL to a list (I tried both comma delimited and space delimited) where the first list item was the address of a downed collector.
creator: blin
